sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FaPhone, FaEnvelope, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaClock, FaFacebook, FaInstagram, FaLinkedin, FaUser, FaMessage } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './Contact.css'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); // Simulate form submission delay setTimeout(() => { alert('Thank you for your message! We will get back to you within 24 hours.'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }); setIsSubmitting(false); }, 2000); }; const contactMethods = [ { icon: , title: 'Phone', content: '(571) 992-9966', link: 'tel:+15719929966', description: 'Call us directly for immediate assistance' }, { icon: , title: 'Email', content: 'primescapebrothers1@gmail.com', link: 'mailto:primescapebrothers1@gmail.com', description: 'Send us a detailed message' }, { icon: , title: 'Service Area', content: 'Northern Virginia & Surrounding Areas', link: '#', description: 'We serve the greater Northern Virginia region' }, { icon: , title: 'Business Hours', content: 'Mon-Fri: 8AM-6PM, Sat: 9AM-4PM', link: '#', description: 'Available for consultations and emergency calls' } ]; const socialLinks = [ { icon: , name: 'Facebook', url: '#', color: '#1877f2' }, { icon: , name: 'Instagram', url: '#', color: '#e4405f' }, { icon: , name: 'LinkedIn', url: '#', color: '#0077b5' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Get In Touch

Ready to start your project? Have questions about our services? We're here to help and would love to hear from you.

{/* Contact Methods */}

Contact Information

Multiple ways to reach us - choose what works best for you

{contactMethods.map((method, index) => (
{method.icon}

{method.title}

{method.content}

{method.description}

))}
{/* Custom Contact Form */}

Send Us a Message

Have a question or want to discuss your project? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

{/* Social Media */}

Follow Us

Stay updated with our latest projects and company news

{socialLinks.map((social, index) => (
{social.icon}
{social.name} ))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Get Started?

Don't wait to transform your space. Contact us today and let's discuss your project.

Call Now: (571) 992-9966 Send Email
); }; export default Contact;
